heading: no slap on wrist
subheading: slap your child, go to china? that's the predicament hou-lin li and luying deng are facing in chicago. the immigrant couple had slapped their daughter, who'd admitted to forging one of her parents' signature on a teacher's note and lying about the loss of a ring that had been a birthday gift. a cop saw the red-faced girl crying and arrested the parents. prosecutors have rejected a plea bargain that would keep mother, father, and even daughter from being deported. the trial on domestic battery charges is set for monday.
author: wired staff
